name: All Is Well
description:
What is it?

A physics puzzle game about throwing things at other things. We made it in 4 days for the Portsmouth University Gamejam 2022 using construct3.

The themes were: Masquerade, Sacrifice and The Honourable Eric Reece 32nd Premier of Tasmania.

Controls

Right Click/ Left trigger - pick up items.

WSAD/Arrow Keys/D-Pad/Left analogue stick- movement.

Right Analogue stick/Mouse control - throw items.

R/Select- restart Enter/Start- skip level

F11 - Toggle Full Screen

Feedback is welcome! Despite the limited time and the memes we believe playtesting and feedback is the best way to improve at design (and the other aspects of game development) and we'd be happy to hear from you!

~Nathan
